snippet: The International Olympic Committee said prospective contenders must submit their candidacies by Sept. 15.
abstract: International Olympic Committee says prospective contenders for 2024 Summer Olympics must submit their candidacies by Sept 15, 2015; other Olympic news noted.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said prospective contenders must submit their candidacies by Sept. 15.

headline.main: Timeline Set for Bids For the 2024 Games
headline.print_headline: Timeline Set for Bids for the 2024 Games
